mapper.select: SELECT to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as 시간, sum(pos_totprice) as 합계 FROM tb_pos WHERE to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{selectDay} GROUP BY to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ORDER BY to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as 일, sum(pos_totprice) as 합계 FROM tb_pos WHERE to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM') = #{selectMon} GROUP BY to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM') as 월, sum(pos_totprice) as 합계 FROM tb_pos WHERE to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY') = #{selectYear} GROUP BY to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY to_char(pos_date, 'YYYY-MM')
